persona.name: Rowan
persona.bio: Rowan, a 63-year-old full-time trader, is an expert in the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, known for their cooperative spirit and a touch of impatience that drives them to seize opportunities swiftly. With decades of experience, Rowan blends strategic analysis with a keen intuition, often collaborating with fellow traders to navigate the volatile market landscape. Their impatience ensures they remain agile, making quick, informed decisions that capitalize on market shifts.
